gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.decorate

Class DefaultFrameDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.decorate.FrameDecorator
      • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.decorate.DefaultFrameDecorator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParticleMotionRenderer.DefaultDecorator, SliceWaveRenderer.DefaultWaveFrameDecorator, SpectraRenderer.DefaultSpectraFrameDecorator, SpectrogramRenderer.DefaultWaveFrameDecorator

    public class DefaultFrameDecorator
extends FrameDecorator

    Class which holds information about method of title and axis rendering - positions, lines, ticks count etc. Can configure given FrameRenderer.

    Author:
    Dan Cervelli

      • createLabels

        public static String[] createLabels(double[] t,
                    boolean log,
                    double m,
                    double b)
        Create string array with label text according to numberFormat setting.
        Parameters:
        t - array of double values
        log - if logarithm scale enabled
        m - never used
        b - never used
        Returns:
        String array the same size with labels text

      • addLabel

        Add to FrameRenderer specialized renderer to draw label with default font and color.
        Parameters:
        fr - Frame renderer to process
        text - label text
        loc - label location
        Returns:
        Created TextRenderer to process label
